meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Centaurium, typically with pink or red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The centaury in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked some centaury to add color to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The centaury seemed to be showing off its vibrant petals.
meanings.sent4: The centaury stood out among the greenery like a tiny fire.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the centaury lingered in the air, sweet and fresh.

meanings.definition: A bitter-tasting herb used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The centaury herb had a strong taste when brewed.
meanings.sent2: She used centaury in her remedies for its healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The centaury herb made her face scrunch up in distaste.
meanings.sent4: The bitterness of centaury lingered on her tongue like a memory.
meanings.sent5: The centaury herb was potent, leaving a lasting impression on her palate.

meanings.definition: A mythical creature with the body of a horse and the torso of a human.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of the centaury roaming the forests at night.
meanings.sent2: The centaury in the story was a majestic being.
meanings.sent3: The centaury's unique appearance always fascinated children.
meanings.sent4: The centaury symbolized the harmony between nature and humanity.
meanings.sent5: The image of the centaury galloping through the woods was enchanting.
